feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI1C][Private Cloud] - VMware Private Cloud maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 26, 08:00 UTC  -  Dec 3, 17:00 UTC

Nov 19, 22:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware offer.

Start time : 26/11/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 03/12/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact expected as hosts are spared in another rack - only vMotion on customer side.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2a][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification
entry.content:
Nov 22, 20:06 UTC
Monitoring - We would like to inform you that the incident has been resolved.
All services have been operational since 22/11/2024 19:35 UTC.
Our technical team is monitoring the incident over the weekend to ensure that the service is fully concluded.

Nov 22, 19:02 UTC
Update - Our teams are working to resolve this incident once and for all since 15:42 UTC.
The impacted servers have been reconnected. We are in the process of checking the condition of the services.
A significant number of services are operational again.

We will keep you informed when we will have additional detail or when the servers will be available again


We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Nov 22, 17:58 UTC
Update - Our technical team is mobilized and has been working on resolving the incident since 22/11/2024 15:42 UTC.
Hardware verification ongoing on impacted servers.
We will keep you informed when we will have additional detail or when the servers will be available again

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Nov 22, 17:02 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified as a cooling issue, and a fix is being implemented.
Our teams are fully mobilized, and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Nov 22, 16:00 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our VMware Private Cloud offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start Time : 22/11/2024 15:42 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2a
Service impact : Some datastores are temporarily unavailable.
Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [CA/EU][Backup as a Service] - Veeam Enterprise maintenance notification
entry.content:
Nov 20, 16:02 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational again.

Nov 19, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 15, 15:14 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Veeam Enterprise offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 19/11/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/11/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, Veeam Enterprise service will be unavailable and customers won't be able to perform any new requests (registrations, updates, remove,...) from their backup servers to OVH Veeam enterprise manager.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Veeam Enterprise servers to the latest version.

Thank you for your understanding.
